headline: Is HP A Hidden Opportunity After a 20% Slide and Fresh Buyback Focus?
summary: If you are wondering whether HP is a quietly mispriced opportunity or a value trap at today's levels, this article is for you. Despite being down 20.2% year to date and 25.5% over the past year, HP has bounced 6.1% in the last week while still sitting well below its 5 year gain of 31.3%. Recent headlines have focused on HP's ongoing share buyback program and strategic focus on higher margin commercial PCs and peripherals, which help explain why the market is reassessing the stock.
